@P A oyata waradila. UNP ekata chande dana ayata pissu. Dakkane karapu tika. Apita, godak ayata one aluth kramayak. Rohan Pallewatta, Naga genne aluth krama, hora moda nasthi kara wada walata ida na.

@P A Thama therila na wage. Hitapu ayyai inna ayyai mokada kale kiyala penne nadda manussayo?  Naga ganath hoyala balanna. Ita passe kiyanna kothanada therenne naththe kiyala. Paw ape rate mahansiyen wada karana  minissu, puluwan aya wena rata wala. 21/4 eda thamai mata athi une, eda thamai mama dana gathhe pata paksha sellam karanne kiyala. Dan athi eka. Nagata salli one nam reguwe kale hoda salliyak hoyanna thibuna. Mama dannawa commis walin posath una aya.

replies.replyComment: @P A Pata paksha thamai Muslim chanda hoya hoya passen giye. Me para wenas, Okkoma ekathu wela aluth pakshayakata denawa. Gotata one na, eya karan wada aluth ayata hodata karanna puluwan neethi kada karanne nathiwa. Muslim rata alla gannawa kiyala minissunwa baya karala thiyenne. Moda minissu Gota awa kiyala hora wada nathi neethi athi ratak athi wenne na. Inna palakayan wenas wenne na. Lagin gavichchi minissu posath wenawa duppathage salli walin. Mawa dakala athi wela. Ahanna Ajith Kolonne, Chandima Gomez ge katha. Eyala inne ratata wadak karanna balagan.
